1:
Yahweh, I will sing to you!\q1 I will sing about your faithful and just loyalty to us.


\q1
2:
I promise that while I rule people,\q2 I will behave in such a way that no one will be able to criticize me.
\q2 Yahweh, when will you come to help me?
\q1 I will do things that are right.
\q1
4:
I will not be dishonest,\q2 and I will not have anything to do with evil.
\q1
5:
I will get rid of anyone who secretly slanders someone else,\q1 and I will not let anyone near me who is proud and arrogant.
\q1
6:
I will approve of people in this land who are loyal to God,\q1 and I will allow them to live with me.
\q2 I will allow to serve me those who behave in such a way that no one can criticize them.



\q1
7:
I will not allow anyone who deceives others to work in my palace,\q1 and no one who tells lies will be allowed to continually come to work for me.
\q1
8: Every day I will try to get rid of all the wicked people in this land;\q1 I will expel them from this city, which is Yahweh's city.
